Review.Titre: I did not know how to broadcast my…
Review.Contenu: I did not know how to broadcast my Facebook post on Restream

Review.Titre: Please keep restream professional - Have been streaming for years using…
Review.Contenu: Have been streaming for years using restream, for the first time they have added a pumpkin icon where our assets are - preloaded videos and images are, now I guessed where it was, but for those on the team who may not be able to discern it clearly - this was a problem, the platform had especial glitches today, freezing when the livestream was inadvertently ended and not reverting to the Orange/Red 'Go Live now', so we would know it had stopped streaming. Please keep the platform professional with consistent icons, it is not necessary to make the functional icons seasonal. We have seen the Christmas overlays last year, thank you. However some users like ourselves are using restream for corporate purposes in a team setting.

Review.Titre: Pathetic Experience - Do not go with them!
Review.Contenu: I had a pathetic experience with Restream. I purchased their standard plan for the full year and started facing issues and tried to post them to their support agents who did not resolve in the right way (pathetic support experience). Finally after 4 months I requested for a prorated refund which they denied. I will advise users not to go with Restream or atleast be on their monthly plan and not go for annual plan.

Review.Titre: I used them everyday for more than one…
Review.Contenu: I used them everyday for more than one year and I know much about restream.io. It seems they have much traffic from the UK that it take for ever to let you sign in to the service. We stream from different countries including in europe and I noticed the login issue only from inside the UK. Platform always miss things up, Chat integration will not work. video will not start, user syncing issues. Logo appears to you but not in youtube and loads of other problems. Their customer service are quite fast and nice unless it's a core problem then that act like novice and do time wasting tactics so you'll give up before they admit the problem. They'll ask for endless number of reports and snaps just so tire you because they know about the issue and have no way to resolve it.In general they are good but very unstable.and for the PR who will reposnd to this asking me to speak to them for solutions, I already did and willing to have a chat to demostrate all issues I suffer from. Please don't respond with the same template. find my phone number from your platform and give me a ring.

Review.Titre: I had deactivated this account months…
Review.Contenu: I had deactivated this account months ago for the lack of quality customer service, poor recording quality and lack of security. On Monday, October 25th, I was a guest on a show that uses this service. On Friday, I received an invoice from restream in the amount of $49.00 this was unauthorized, Iam not a customer. Thus is fraudulent activity which I'm reporting to the BBB and need be to the appropriate law.

Review.Titre: Poor Customer Service and Policy
Review.Contenu: It's pretty dumb that this company doesn't have a refund policy regarding the automatic charge. I have been charged today with the last money that I have and they do not want to refund it because I forgot to cancel the subscription. They should have at least have a 3 days refund policy when it comes to automatic charges like this because there are people who really need their money and there are times that people forget what subscriptions they have on other websites. Their Customer Services turnaround time regarding escalations is pretty poor. 1-2 days? really? You have a live chat available 24/7 and there's no one to supervise regarding escalation? I have a chat active with the agent named "Cray" and it looks like he's ignoring my messages. I know how the Crisp live chat works and I know Multiple agents can see my chat and no one is responding. Is that how you treat your customers?I do not recommend this company to anyone who likes to go live on multiple platforms.

Review.Titre: I found it to be a horrible platform…
Review.Contenu: I found it to be a horrible platform Service.  Had to pay $500.00 upfront for a full year. Kept it for only 2 months because streaming our services with RESTREAM had many ‘hiccups’ and problems.  We had better streaming without it!! It was so bad I cancelled the service after only 2 months! THEN THEY TELL ME THERE WILL BE NO REFUND AND IF I DECIDE TO REJOIN THEY WOULD OFFERED ME A ‘SPECIAL’ OFFER TO REJOIN!!!😡😡😡😡😡😡😡 I WOULD NEVER EVER USE RESTREAM AGAIN! SAVE YOUR MONEY!

Review.Titre: Awful customer service
Review.Contenu: Awful customer service, it sounds like you're talking to bots. Laggy streaming on Linkedin. Terrible experience.

Review.Titre: never works there is always something…
Review.Contenu: never works there is always something wrong. You can message the customer service from your site as there is hno message box then Google chrome wont stream your videos they stick all the time, so they tell y0u to use Fire fox which has no viewer count and now its had a bug on it apparently all week. No one fixes anything and you go back week after week with the same issues. Surely there is a better streaing provider????

Review.Titre: Still spamming after I unsubscribed
Review.Contenu: I unsubscribed from their mails. A couple of days later I got a new mail from a new mail account.

Review.Titre: Tech guy on vacation... I wish i was a tech guy at restream...
Review.Contenu: I had an issue with connecting daily motion for an event created on restream and I feel I had to contact the customer support 10 times, and they were always asking me same questions, then they said the tech guy was on vacation. I pay 40 USD per month to have something that doesn't work, that is 480 USD for a service for which the tech guy is on vacation... not cool. I'm tired, I am a creative, I use restream to restream my content and I pay for it to work. I don't have time to try to figure out what are the issues between the tech guy on vacation and the customer support who keeps asking me same questions without fixing the issue. If you advertise a service that is supposed to broadcast everywhere, you need to be a little more clear about what you offer an make it work. You may want to warn the clients that the client will often have a lot of trouble to make it work : not because the client is stupid but simply because the service was not designed properly. If the tech guy is on vacation, then you need a replacement, I work 365 days a year and I don't have time for vacation. My business is everything and all these tech people who are not able to make things work are really really annoying me. If I provided that kind of quality of service to my clients, I would have a horrible reputation. Make it work or don't advertise something that does not work. Thanks

Review.Titre: I got stolen by those guys
Mihail is so rude
Review.Contenu: Mihail is so rude. Bad customer support.

Review.Titre: Many many streaming stucks
Review.Contenu: Many many streaming stucks, servers have many many streams and in high hours nothing works fine.Its very expensive without web player in low cost plans.I had working this service with ndi cameras for 3 years, today restream have many streamings accounts with many streaming problems.

Review.Titre: Laggy, Buggy, and Expensive
Review.Contenu: Chat merged is convenient. Had multiple connection issues that I couldn’t resolve. Laggy, and expensive.

Review.Titre: This was once a useful service but has…
Review.Contenu: This was once a useful service but has become greedy and moved core features behind a paid wall.

Review.Titre: Good Product, but with a little work on customer etiquette
Review.Contenu: Restream is a great product, and very advantageous in the way the world is going with online content. The platform speaks for itself and is the leader currently in online webinar software. Although the product is great, Initially I had a very bad experience with sales team, false statements, rudeness and lack of care of customer was felt. After leaving a negative review and attempting to contact senior support, I was able to finally get in contact with someone who was great.  I received a formal apology and other benefits as courtesy. It's been mentioned that they will take on thoughts from what I shared to improve service in the future.

Review.Titre: I like the fact that I can send to 1…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact that I can send to 1 location and have it distributed to multiple locations. Would have given it 5 stars EXCEPT for the problem that the web interface never showed that YouTube was "live" and Facebook never got a feed that I ever found. Could be my issue, but once I start, I didn't want to stop the feed to troubleshoot.

Review.Titre: To Restream
Review.Contenu: I have been using restream on the free version now for about 1/2 a year now for streaming fortnite and apex legends and its great, but the one thing im a bit anoyed a bout is, is that it only streams on 30 fps on the free version and i dont really want to pay $41 a month for pro. So could you please make the free version stream at 720p 60fps.

Review.Titre: Its great for streaming on multiple…
Review.Contenu: Its great for streaming on multiple platforms but need work twitch channel rewards dont show up so when someone uses hydrate it doesnt show and games title need updating not alot of options

Review.Titre: Restream is fairly easy to use
Review.Contenu: The interface is fairly easy to navigate, and getting set up to stream to multiple platforms was fairly easy. The combined chat display on the dashboard is helpful in keeping track with what is going on with each platform's chat.

Review.Titre: Works really well, but makes OBS bug?
Review.Contenu: Works really well, I use it to stream to both YT and Twtich. Only suboptimal experience is I've gotten some weird bugs after connecting it to my OBS software (such as the on-stream chat not updating, chat settings not working properly, etc.) I'm not sure how much of this is Restream and how much is OBS, or the fact that I work on a Linux instead of a Windows. All in all, I managed to get around the bugs pretty easily, and had a great time!

Review.Titre: YouTube channels work well on Restream
Review.Contenu: YouTube channels work well on Restream. Utilizing a personal Facebook page on Restream is difficult.  You have to quickly change your settings on your personal FB from private to public or you cannot engage with anyone from that page.

Review.Titre: We migrated our Podcast to a LinkedIn…
Review.Contenu: We migrated our Podcast to a LinkedIn Live format and initially tried OBS, which did not go well. We then switched to Restream and Restream Studio, and everything has been smooth ever since! I love the ability to stream to Facebook, Youtube, Twitter, etc., simultaneously.

Review.Titre: wishing for one more admin spot
Review.Contenu: wishing for one more admin spot - basic level comes with 2, next level offers 4. I need 3. Cannot take the $$ leap to the next level yet.Otherwise, the platform is really good. Often a considerable lag to youtube but we are working around that.

Review.Titre: Restream remains the best streaming…
Review.Contenu: Restream remains the best streaming platform you can think of.Their studio features is all encompassing and will accommodate all your program need. Use RESTREAM BECAUSE IT’S THE BEST STREAMING PLATFORM.The room for improvement remains endless and the management is committed to it.

Review.Titre: Now that I am able to work more with my…
Review.Contenu: Now that I am able to work more with my restream account, I am getting more familiar with it. There is much more for me to learn about the things I can do with restream, but instructions are easy to follow.

Review.Titre: I have been doing Facebook live since…April 2020
Review.Contenu: I have been doing Facebook live since 2020 and have streamed with OBS and other tools but it was not until I found restroom that I had a glitch-free experience and it is getting better. It would be perfect but I have not mastered all the awesome aspects of this service.

Review.Titre: I really do like Restream a lot more…
Review.Contenu: I really do like Restream a lot more than Zoom because of how clear it is.  There are also a lot more options than with Zoom.  The only reason that I have given it 4 stars would be for the following two things.  The first most important reason is that people have trouble connecting to the stream.  They usually have to try three or four times first before they can get connected.  The second is that there is no way to lock a meeting so that uninvited people can't hack their way in.

Review.Titre: Excellent web browser based streaming…
Review.Contenu: Excellent web browser based streaming software. Secure but expensive. Online support was very helpful in setting up multiple video cameras.A handy companion to a desktop app also for your streaming.

Review.Titre: The program is pretty good overall
Review.Contenu: The program is pretty good overall. It is pricey, however. I'm disappointed that we can only use a background with the laptop or desktop. The background feature doesn't work with phones and tablets. Periodically, setting up an external mic for live streams through Safari on iPad can get glitchy and people cannot hear you. I've had to simply disconnect the mic.Many of the channels on which you can multistream are platforms most people do not use, so it's overkill for the price.  You can't stream to IG,certain LinkedIn free accounts, or Tictoc (obviously). You don't need an app for Restream and it runs directly from a website.  This is a great plus for several reasons.  The learning curve is short and and the ease of use great. I an pleased with Restream but wish they would add more backgrounds, overlays,  and graphics to give us  more professional looks and greater variety.  Of note, if you're techno savvy, you may download your own.

Review.Titre: It's so easy to figure out
Review.Contenu: It's so easy to figure out quickly get using it. For the first time, I'm streaming to all my platforms at once and when I do interviews, it's sooo easy for the guest to click a link and viola.  My only issue is having it say Facebook user instead of the person's name. Otherwise it's been great.

Review.Titre: The app works well, had 1 problem
Review.Contenu: The app works wellThe only issue or problem I had is that one stream seemed to have much better quality, while the other one looked like a pixelated mess. That could be an issue with my internet connection, but still easy to use and i think worth trying out

Review.Titre: Great service for any level streamer
Review.Contenu: Great service, especially for anyone just getting started with streaming, where multi-channel support is key which only makes sense. It’s designed for out of the box use and it’s almost that. I ran into a couple of issues: 1. Video output bitrate being was too high for Twitch which made me appear offline; 2. Chat inputs from Twitch and YouTube would not display on Restream chat when I tested them using different profiles. Oddly enough a spam chat items got through via YouTube which I’ve never gotten until I started on Restream (not sure if that’s a customer data vulnerability). Great feature though to be able to block/interact directly (on behalf of your YouTube account) within Restream chat. In both instances, I had to search for solutions which I found outside of Restream. I also don’t know how to get to the chat from home, so I have to Google to get to its landing page and then select browser chat window over desktop app (on my phone which is my second screen). It’s also hard to get to the broadcast page.

Review.Titre: Most of the time it is fine
Review.Contenu: Most of the time it is fine, but last week I had no sound except sputtery noises. Not sure why but it was very upsetting and my followers were mad. Luckily I did also use instagram on my phone to go live so I was able to send my followers there.

Review.Titre: This is a great software and it really…
Review.Contenu: This is a great software and it really offers a great deal of interface, it's very easy to handle. However I was suggesting if it can be possible to incorporate posting comments from the software to Facebook also it would really look awesome.

Review.Titre: I love Restream but it isnt keeping…
Review.Contenu: I love Restream but it isnt keeping with the times as it does not import the chat or viewer statistics of Rumble. Please fix this quickly. Yes, I know Rumble is RTMP.

Review.Titre: This is the best streaming platform…
Review.Contenu: This is the best streaming platform there is. Trust me I stream 2-3 times a week and have tried multiple platforms. The studio and obs is second to none and is a very clean set up. I will give it 5 stars when it has browser source to overlay chat on screen not in ac separate windows. No one really has mastered this yet so I don’t blame them.

Review.Titre: I won't give them a five star yet.
Review.Contenu: I won't give them a five star yet, because we're still on the freebie version. Otherwise, it's nice having a centralized platform to stream content to different social media accounts.

Review.Titre: Easy to Use
Review.Contenu: its  must easier to use than other platforms, i know there is more that i can do with program, but haven't fiquered it out yet

Review.Titre: WORD of da KINGDOM(Mt13:19)
Review.Contenu: I like ReStream I needed to live post to FaceBook & YouTube at the same timeI found other stream service but they would only do one or the other not both at the same timeThe wife & I do an OnLine BIBLE ministry called WORD of da KINGDOM every Sun 8a🕗 CST Learning curve:I’m able now change background Do CountDown clock Post my SCRIPTURE on screen Answer comments in realTimeIt is in engaging I only have 1 complaint as to why 4star & not 5star It don’t/won’t post live to InstaGram(I still have to use my phone Here is a link to show one Sun teaching I pray you fed & blessed(Jn4:31-34) YouTube: Delvin IshmanMilk of da WORD (Heb5:12-6:2)

Review.Titre: Restream has a lot of great features…
Review.Contenu: Restream has a lot of great features which actually make it a step above similar applications. To have animated backgrounds built into the app is incredible.

Review.Titre: Works as designed
Review.Contenu: Works as designed. No drawbacks so far. Site a little clunky but really irrelevant if service works as expected. Glad I made the switch.

Review.Titre: This site is perfect for what I need it…
Review.Contenu: This site is perfect for what I need it is a little glitchy  but other than that it works well and I have no other complaints. Thank you Restream.

Review.Titre: Allows easy live streaming on different…
Review.Contenu: Allows easy live streaming on different platforms, some missing features but it works really well in general!

Review.Titre: VinnDoggRadio cool restream review
Review.Contenu: I love the fact that I am able navigate Easley being a legally blind broadcaster.

Review.Titre: This is a nice streaming app but it…
Review.Contenu: This is a nice streaming app but it lags too much sometimes so I would recommend restream.io that they should fix the lag. So I give it 4 stars......

Review.Titre: My only complaint is that I cannot see…
Review.Contenu: My only complaint is that I cannot see my chat when I am sharing my screen.

Review.Titre: a good product
Review.Contenu: a good product, not that expensive but it delivers a very good outcome with it's flexibility to deliver the streamed programs

Review.Titre: I love it but I am still confused on…
Review.Contenu: I love it but I am still confused on how to share my screen when I go live.

Review.Titre: Things to improve ..
Review.Contenu: Things to improve ... More stream settings to adjust especially on YouTube , like turn on ads which is important. Secondly, the Restream Chat needs improvement like showing the Membership (paid status) next to their name , like how it shows on YouTube chat or even to show "Member" next to his name in the chat, for example John Luke "member" says...  I like your stream . Btw 4 stars and in general Restream is great and helps the streamers alot. Thank you

Review.Titre: For the Record
Review.Contenu: Restream have always a bit to improve, clearly in comparison with the market its winning but can do more. There are being created alternatives and restream needs to balance his prices in order to shut them up.The improvements can be more regular and scheduled but the attention to the customer reaches good levels.

Review.Titre: Good site good support
It works better than many other…
Review.Contenu: It works better than many other streaming services .. I like the live studio a very promising feature.I don't like that they add their platform to the description of the video I'm streaming even when paying $19 a month.

Review.Titre: Restream very nice 👍👍👍👍
very useful however....
Review.Contenu: very useful however on streaming youtube , on changing titles and stuff , it needs to be thumbnails and tags added to it. everything else is awesome

Review.Titre: Love it.
Review.Contenu: Love it.Want to send out more streams where we can.

Review.Titre: Love this app too much but only one problem…
Review.Contenu: Love this app too much but one problem that it does not show the streamed video on YouTube please fix this problem. Plz.

Review.Titre: A very nice platform even on the free…
Review.Contenu: A very nice platform even on the free version it's amazing. Though it has limited functionality.

Review.Titre: Problem
Review.Contenu: Hi. Regarding to restream. It has been great, but how can I stream from zoom without a credit card?

Review.Titre: Its a excellent website it is doing…
Review.Contenu: Its a excellent website it is doing great job,in short I love it

Review.Pseudo: É Mexendo que se Aprende Por t
Review.Titre: Not the best, but i still like it
Review.Contenu: Not the best, but it helps me multi-stream!

Review.Titre: very good👍 :D
It's very useful
Nice video😍
Restream.io offers robust…
Review.Contenu: Restream.io offers robust multi-streaming capabilities, allowing users to broadcast content across various platforms simultaneously. The platform stands out for its user-friendly interface and broad channel support. However, some users find the cost to be relatively high compared to alternatives like oncast.in and streamyard.com. Despite the pricing, Restream.io remains a preferred choice for those prioritizing seamless multi-platform streaming.

Review.Titre: Great experience
Review.Contenu: Great experience. Their service works well. I’ve tried a few different methods and other companies for multi streaming and honestly Restream is by far the best and easiest to use. It works well, their chat all in one place is super useful and even their free tier works great. I recently upgraded to their 1st paid tier and I’m so far very happy with the additional features I have. There pricing was clear and I check and unsubscribing looks to be easy which is always good when a company makes that process transparent.Overall I recommend restream

Review.Titre: The ease of using the platform and…
Review.Contenu: The ease of using the platform and above all the responsiveness from support when you have a problem is amazing.

Review.Titre: I love it
Review.Contenu: I love it i used to do my streams with OBS and Restream makes is simpler I stream business plans on Youtube for Angel Start so i need to be able to invite guests and Restream makes it easy

Review.Titre: I am a zoom user and a home-production source of video content for clients and customers.
Review.Contenu: I am a zoom user. I have an account with Screencast O'Matic for video editing purposes. On my first organized run using Restream -- without yet running concurrent live streams -- what a fantastic third leg for my video content management stool. The downloaded videos are excellent quality.

Review.Titre: Restream is one of my most valued tools…
Review.Contenu: Restream is one of my most valued tools in my daily streams in COOLZTV MEDIACENTER, and TvvT.no #peoplemadeTV. With my PRO ACCOUNT I can use this RTMP PULL link using RESTREAM as a base of my remote video feeds into my production program WIRECAST PRO. This gives the perfect video and audio stream endlessly. Sivert ceo

Review.Titre: I practiced 3 or 4 times by streaming…
Review.Contenu: I practiced 3 or 4 times by streaming to a "test" group in Facebook that has zero people in it. I am so glad I did because I needed to get comfortable with clicking in certain places and making sure things looked the way I wanted. I love that I can add an overlay and toggle between one with my topic and one with a Call to Action to visit my website. It really does add a polished layer of professionalism and I will be using this a lot.

Review.Titre: Customer Service Dependability
Review.Contenu: Customer service. When I encounter difficulties, you may wonder if things will work out. Well, I reach into the area that reads "help needed" and true enough help was present and available, while my stream was in progress. Though all other areas of the software work fine. You can't beat reliable customer service. Maybe on another occasion, I'll have more to say and add.

Review.Titre: Love that the 2 platforms is free and…
Review.Contenu: Love that the 2 platforms is free and has good features. I am considering stepping up to 5 and doing 3 social media’s along side. The chat box is great and posting from each source, just wish it either had more customisation choices to make your own or skins for it either free or paid! People like having chat on stream and think this could be a great improvement for customisation and an avenue source for you as a company if you sell “skins” for the chat.

Review.Titre: It's a bit of a learning curve and I am…
Review.Contenu: It's a bit of a learning curve and I am still learning, that being said the ability to connect to different streams is very powerful!  Once I get some Live streaming under my belt I can see myself being a paid customer. there's a lot you can do on the free account . Another big plus!

Review.Titre: I do live sports streaming from the…
Review.Contenu: I do live sports streaming from the local high school, and I use their LAN as my means to send to the world. They have Facebook blocked on their routers, so Restream is my destination for live streaming, thereby circumventing the blocks. We are currently only signed up on YouTube and Facebook, so the fact Restream allows us a free version that fulfills those two is wonderful!! I love the fact I get reports about our stream quality and viewership. I can't imagine how a rural outfit like ours can not love Restream!

Review.Titre: Restream has made it pretty painless…
Review.Contenu: Restream has made it pretty painless for me to multistream on Twitch & YT--and a recent update removed my frustration entirely, allowing me to create and use YouTube events without having to log out of OBS to do so.Their chat program is a huge help as well, allowing me to overlay it on my main monitor so I can see it while in-game--as long as my game is in Borderless Windowed instead of Full Screen.It would be great if I could have it on top while in Full Screen too.

Review.Titre: Try Free Restream before you buy!
Review.Contenu: Lots of friends have You tube channels, and as I have started my own, I took advice from other Restream users, and tried the free offer to get used to working from the studio. Hooking up to my you tube and face book accounts was straight forward. Using the mobile app also allows instant streaming from anywhere. All in all, I well pleased with Restream.

Review.Titre: So far very easy to use
Review.Contenu: So far very easy to use. Love how the comments from viewers can be done as an overlay to not miss a single one. Would love if videos automatically adjusted to fit the screen. But would definitely recommend to anyone that goes live with their podcast

Review.Titre: Restream.io is the real differentiator…
Review.Contenu: Restream.io is the real differentiator for salesXchange Ltd - Going live or restreaming after the first live show and looping.  Digital marketing has failed B2B organisations for many years, everyone uses the same technology and thinks they're different to their competition.  I believe Restream is the only currently available stream tech that can make a difference to generating new business.  Prospect awareness is only built upon repetition (replaying-restreaming-looping!). It takes approx. 30 attempts to get noticed.  1-in-3 get through so you need 90 lined up.  Our engagement has flipped with Restream.  No more to be said.

Review.Titre: Restream is amazing
Review.Contenu: Restream is amazing! The tools for making professional looking overlays, inviting guests, adding cameras, seeing the chat, and much much more are so well designed and intuitive. We even had a situation where we needed to stream to multiple destinations simultaneously, and a rep upgraded a second account for us temporarily, at no cost, so we could put on our event. I can't say enough good things about Restream.

Review.Titre: Restream is perfect for our needs
Review.Contenu: Restream is perfect for our needs: a simple hub for forwarding livestreams to multiple platforms.  It's affordable, easy to setup, and so far has worked flawlessly.  I especially appreciate the statistics  and chat integration with OBS, which has enabled us reduce 1 volunteer from our workflow. Keep up the good work!

Review.Titre: Still learning but so far so good
Review.Contenu: Still learning but so far so good. Easy to use and very efficient.

Review.Titre: This software is intuitive and it WORKS
Review.Contenu: Don't you just love it when software is intuitive. It is so easy that you don't have to ask anyone how it works! I am so grateful that I discovered restream.io and that it is affordable for the "little guy" cause I am hoping the multi-casting is going to help me grow my business.

Review.Pseudo: Kevin Yeh Uncle Kevin说保险理财
Review.Titre: An easy to learn, powerful livestream platform
Review.Contenu: I am a beginner when it comes to livestreaming. I was looking at two platforms: Streamyard as promoted by many YouTubers and Restream. I started with Restream free plan, and I found Restream free to have more features compared to Streamyard. It was not difficult to learn the basics. Then I upgraded to the Standard Plan to be able to schedule events. Overall I found it a great livestream platform.

Review.Titre: I am a new user and this product is…
Review.Contenu: I am a new user and this product is Excellent! ReStream is Very Easy to Setup and Use on Multiple Platforms at the same time! YAYYYY! I am Glad I Invested in ReStream Professional Plan to receive Extra Great Benefits!Dr. Renata W. Hannah, Ph.D.

Review.Titre: Gloria Dei Lutheran Church - Highland, IN increases virtual worship attendance.
Review.Contenu: Our Church recently subscribed to Restream so we could provide our worship services on both YouTube and Facebook. The downloading and set up was easy and we have on average increased "attendance" by over 100%! Restream is an easy to use and great product for our Church.

Review.Titre: I have been searching for a platform…
Review.Contenu: I have been searching for a platform that gives me the best audience while requiring less technical knowledge and/or equipment at a reasonable price. Restream has not only done all of this but it has also opened the door to other outlets.

Review.Titre: The platform is very user-friendly and…
Review.Contenu: The platform is very user-friendly and even at the 1st Member Tier, it offers far more tools and add-ons than any other broadcaster I have used. I am sold! And quite possibly a permanent user! Awesome job Restream!!!!!

Review.Titre: Live Safaris from Kenya Simulcast by Restream
Review.Contenu: I Stream Live Safaris from Kenya via Zoom, love the convenience of being able to multicast on my platforms and reaching a as many people as I can with Restream. It is simple and easy to use and has a wide range of help options to go along with it. Absolutely love Restream.

Review.Titre: I really like the platform
Review.Contenu: I really like the platform, I make my broadcasts without any problem. I would like more background music options of different styles and we can also use stickers and gifs. I really like the platform, I make my broadcasts without any problem. I would like more background music options of different styles and we can also use stickers and gifs.But it's all very good, for those who still don't know I suggest getting to know it quickly. Great value for money

Review.Titre: Best Multistreaming system, with lots of bonuses.
Review.Contenu: I honestly don't know if there is another, better multistreaming program, but I will never have to look for one now. I use Restream to simultaneously stream to both YouTube and Twitch at 1080p 60fps. I just connected my accounts, plug in the stream event, and start streaming from OBS. I have never had issues with them, and the few times that I had questions, they were quick, helpful, and above all, actual people. I also use their Restream Chat application to have both my Youtube and Twitch chat in one place (also has an "always on top" and transparency feature.) its the best.Seriously. These guys are awesome. I even get custom reports after every stream sent to my email within minutes of finishing.Best part: it's 100% free for what I am using it for.

Review.Titre: I absolutely LOVE Restream
Review.Contenu: I absolutely LOVE Restream! I've been using it for 2 years now, and it never disappoints me. Restream has spectacular friendly and fast live chat support. Thank you for an amazing product!

Review.Titre: I use Restream every day, and LOVE it
Review.Contenu: I use Restream every day. I chose it over alternatives as I need to stream large Zoom calls to multiple streams at once, and Restream handles it perfectly. I also use it for streaming other videos I do to multiple channels at once. Easy to use, very powerful.

Review.Titre: I'm big fan of the Restream platform…
Review.Contenu: I'm big fan of the Restream platform and use it almost daily. I live-stream my podcast and record soundbites and product reviews in the studio. Super easy to use and helps me make my videos look professional.

Review.Titre: Just started using the service
Review.Contenu: Just started using the service , absolutely love it. Great UI, simple, and it just works :)

Review.Titre: Restream is a great tool
Review.Contenu: Restream has a good price, is reliable, offers all the basic features you might expect. There might one or two things more I'd like, but that's it.

Review.Titre: Initial experience of the Restream
Review.Contenu: There was an initial learning curve and I learned by doing.  The Help section is very useful but each situation is unique.  I am using the Free Plan at the moment, and streaming with OBS on two channels. I would like to have the stream links for each channel to inform my viewers of where to find the stream. My workaround is to use my channel links and hope my viewers can find me.

Review.Titre: Absolutely the best platform out there
Review.Contenu: Absolutely the best platform out there! Super customizable and easy to use! Our guests have no software to load. We began streaming our show this month and again, easy and flawless!

Review.Titre: Restream.io is an Incredible Platform
Review.Contenu: Restream.io is an incredible platform. They offer a very generous free plan. It's easy to use. If you get stuck, they offer stellar, and I mean STELLAR live chat support. Thank you for an amazing product.

Review.Titre: I like the simplicity of Restream
Review.Contenu: I like the simplicity of Restream. Focus on the content of streaming not on technical stuff.Space for improvement for me would rather be a few quieter less fancy backgrounds etc.

Review.Titre: I love it
Review.Contenu: I love it, very simple user interface, clear video output and the fact that i can chat with people from different platforms at a go on the same interface simplifies work. Thank you.

Review.Titre: title changing needs work...?
Review.Contenu: i love the ease i can switch where i am streaming to, but maybe improve the title changing feature, works great for twitch but youtube and facebook are a little slow

Review.Titre: Great streaming platform!
Review.Contenu: I really like streaming with restream on multiple platforms. And I love that they save your videos also. The only issue I had was on the last stream the video feed cut near the end of the broadcast and had my viewers wondering what happened. It wasn't a big deal but I will watch if it happens again. Great platform! I will recommend you to my fellow broadcasters!

Review.Titre: Do yourself a favor and stop looking, the answer is here.
Review.Contenu: I have tried several platforms and this one is the winner hands down. Easy to use, keeps stats, etc. As with any product, there are things that would be awesome to improve on, but I recommend this to anyone looking to grow their brand or share their messaging. Well done!

Review.Titre: This a great streamer and much better and easier than Stream Yard. It is also cheaper having better arrangements.
Review.Contenu: I have been using Stream Yard for fee version over a year and after coming across the Restream I found this one is more versatile and easy and cheaper that the other. So I have opted for Restream.

Review.Titre: So far
Review.Contenu: So far, so good. Definitely very intuitive for me.I am going to be a huge fan and promoter of this system once I get comfortable with it.Looking forward,Dr, Gideon F

Review.Titre: I've successfully restreamed to both…
Review.Contenu: I've successfully restreamed to both Twitch.tv and Kick.com many times.  You can now see chat from both platforms on Restream.io!  This is a great tool for multi-platform streaming!

Review.Titre: Brilliant piece of software
Review.Contenu: Brilliant piece of software and excellent customer service... couldn't be happier. Taken my broadcast/podcast to a whole new level. Engage with Success .com

Review.Titre: I like the fact it is very user…
Review.Contenu: I like the fact it is very user friendly. I am not familiar with streaming SW and this has been the easiest to use without add-one or difficulties How-To’s.

Review.Titre: I LOVE Restream..
Review.Contenu: I LOVE Restream... it's like having my own TV studio in my home where I can broadcast on 8 channels and get my message out there!  Use Restream to save time and be EVERYWHERE at once!

Review.Titre: A perfect tool to expend your content :)
Review.Contenu: Well, I respect that you dropped 5 free platform to 2, that's ok... you have to make money. I use Twitch and YouTube to stream with zero problems, very well working machine (I hope I won't jinx it!) Keep up the good work, and make sure two platforms will stay free, I can not afford any penny where I am right now!

Review.Titre: Long time Restream user
Review.Contenu: I've been using Restream for years now and love it. I used their free plan for most of that time & finally upgraded to a basic plan this year.In all that time, Restream has worked flawlessly. I can honestly say I've never had issues with streaming, bandwidth,  quality, or any other aspect of the service. There have been times when I suspected Restream might be the source of some issue, but in every case it's proven to be a problem elsewhere (local settings, problems with Twitch or YouTube, etc.).Is it perfect? No, of course not. Along the way there have been minor issues with the web UI (which they've fixed). I feel like there's room for improvement in configuring sources (I have to go tweak settings right before every stream--it's a minor issue, but it could be better). But overall? Their free plan is really generous (even after limiting it to two target platforms) and their paid plans are a good deal for the price.Looking forward to using their platform for a long time to come. :)(Oh, and for folks saying they wish they could change how the chat looks, you can! You need to know CSS to do it, but it's possible.)

Review.Titre: Flawless and Fun
Review.Contenu: I am new to video and there honestly couldn't be an easier way to get started. Restream has made my introduction to video flawless and fun.

Review.Titre: Easy to set up and use works well with…
Review.Contenu: Easy to set up and use works well with the other media outlets such as Facebook and youtube. Still trying to work out how to get keynote in the screen sharing

Review.Titre: Switched from Zoom and won't go back
Review.Contenu: Switched from Zoom and won't go back! Love being able to stream on multiple platforms with 1 click AND being able to see real time comments from those streams on 1 screen... and the ability to show viewers those comments with 1 click!

Review.Titre: We have been using Restream since June…
Review.Contenu: We have been using Restream since June 2021. Before using Restream we had been using Streamyard for about 6 months. We ran into technical glitches and it was just not user-friendly. I was not really excited about switching over to Restream because I was already exhausted by the countless hours of footage compromised and non-editable. I just thought it might be a video software tool thing in today's modernized age. However, once finding Restream everything changed! It is absolutely amazing how advanced and seamless using their software is. Our footage comes out without any GLITCHES or problems! Such a BEAUTIFUL back-end too! We have a team network of 400+ students and all of them LOVE and CHOOSE Restream for our Public Speaking needs at our student mission Assuaged.com. There are such useful tools and abilities to make your show look lively and AMAZING. The pre-recording feature and ability to stream to MULTIPLE platforms at a reasonable cost are among the best and most exclusive features. This company is ethical and supports various charitable causes. They especially support organizations that represent minorities such as the military and people with disabilities. We love you Restream family!

Review.Titre: Restream is an amazing piece of…
Review.Contenu: Restream is an amazing piece of software. It makes our video podcast look so professional. Keep up the good work, Restream.

Review.Titre: Using Restream.io increases productivity!
Review.Contenu: Using Restream.io has helped make my Live Streams seamless. It is extremely helpful to have my Stream go to multiple channels at once, while also having a Live Chat from all of them. Also I love being able to change the Stream Titles for ALL of my Streams on my OBS.

Review.Titre: New Podcaster
Review.Contenu: My podcast company was officially established in April of 2022. I started using Restream in June and the amount of downloads have grown. Even just being able to edit individual audio has made a significant difference in show quality.

Review.Titre: great platform to use and incredible…

The video quality is very good. If you hit a snag, the chat support is above and beyond helpful. I've been more than happy the past four years.

Review.Titre: Restream is intuitive and priced right
Review.Contenu: Restream is intuitive and priced right. I use this amazing tool to communicate every week. It is powerful and smart and offers flexibility, creativity. I love it!

The setup was so supper easy and linked to Facebook and YouTube with 2 clicks, and we have not had one issue with the lives. It streams every single time. Plus we get a backup of the audio in case there is an issue with our current system. I would give it 10 stars if I could.
